author: CBS News
title: CBS News poll: 53% approve of Trump's handling of coronavirus
description: A new CBS News poll shows 53% of Americans say President Trump is doing a "good job" when it comes to handling the coronavirus pandemic. In a briefing Monday, the president signaled Americans could return to work soon, despite calls from health officials for …
